CustomField.description: [EBH] (EPH-1880) - Targeted Contacts - as the label change was needed, creating a formula field to refer the standard calculated field as standard field label cannot be changed.
CustomField.formula: IF( OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = "EBH_SubCampaign", RecordType.DeveloperName =="EBH_AMOutreach"), NumberOfContacts , IF(OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = "EBH_Campaign", RecordType.DeveloperName = "EBH_CampaignProgramme"), HierarchyNumberOfContacts, null) )
CustomField.label: Targeted Contacts
